revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Travels through Arabia, and other countries in the East, performed by M. Niebuhr, now a captain of engineers in the service of the King of Denmark. Translated into..."
revision.text: Possibly: Travels through Arabia, and other countries in the East, performed by M. Niebuhr, now a captain of engineers in the service of the King of Denmark. Translated into English by Robert Heron. With notes by the translator; and illustrated with engravings and maps. In two volumes. (Carsten Niebuhr). (Edinburgh : Printed for R. Morison and Son, booksellers, Perth, G. Mudie, Edinburgh; and T. Vernor, Birchin Lane, London, 1792). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2439115~S1
